explanation.CLOCKWISE: Wehnelt cap not set to valid height. Please rotate the Wehnelt Cap {{amount}}° clockwise
explanation.COUNTERCLOCKWISE: Wehnelt cap not set to valid height. Please rotate the Wehnelt Cap {{amount}}° counter clockwise
explanation.NONE: Wehnelt cap not set to valid height.

complete.Title: Complete
complete.Caption: Calibration complete
complete.Recommendation: To complete the installation of a new filament, running a conditioning cycle is recommended.

cancel.Title: Cancel calibration
cancel.Message: Are you sure you want to cancel calibrating the filament?
